mapper.select: SELECT commodityId,COUNT(commodityId)AS countCID FROM `userorder` WHERE orderId IN(SELECT orderId FROM `order` WHERE STATUS='交货成功') GROUP BY commodityId ORDER BY countCID desc LIMIT 0,10
SELECT threeTypeId FROM userorder WHERE orderId IN(SELECT orderId FROM `order` WHERE STATUS='交货成功') GROUP BY threeTypeId

SELECT SUM(countCID) as countCID,month(createTime)as time FROM userorder WHERE orderId IN(SELECT orderId FROM `order` WHERE STATUS='交货成功') AND threeTypeId=#{threeTypeID} GROUP BY MONTH(createTime),threeTypeId
SELECT LEFT(clienteleAddress,3) AS Address,COUNT(commodityId)AS countCID FROM `order` o INNER JOIN userorder u ON o.orderId=u.orderID GROUP BY LEFT(clienteleAddress,3) ORDER BY COUNT(commodityId)DESC
